title: Get into a match then between 10-30 minutes will get a black screen
body:
Hi Guys, 

A long while back (Pre 2015 before new map) I went to play League of Legends and I made it into a game and started playing but withing 10-30 minutes of playing my screen suddenly went black and I was unable to do anything. No Alt+Tab no Ctrl+Alt+Del no mouse movement, anything. Every time it happened I had to manually reboot my PC by holding down the Power button on the computer and by the time my computer rebooted it was always too late, or it would immediately do the same thing as before.

I gave my game a break until today (9-01-2016) and it is still having the same issue
I connect, play for 10-30 mins I get the black screen of death, have to reboot PC
Repeat.

Please help.

replies.body:
Hey man,

Sounds to me like you're having issues with your GPU potentially overheating or your graphics drivers crashing.

First off let's eliminate any other potential causes.

*  Update your graphics drivers.
*  Close any other unneeded processes before playing to free up resources.

If those suggestions dont resolve your issue its possible your GPU is overheating, next time you play monitor your GPU's temps, there's many tools available to do this, however my choice is SpeedFan.

If your temperatures seem to be in excess, you'll have to open your computer up to clean the fans on your CPU & GPU, probably your entire case.

When was the last time you cleaned out your case?
Does this occur with any other graphically intense game? Or just league?
